title: Nick Thomas-Symonds – 2022 Comments on Inability to Deliver Trade Deal with the US
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nick Thomas-Symonds, the Shadow Secretary of State for International Trade, on 20 September 2022 in response to comments made by the Prime Minister.
content:
Admitting there is no prospect of a US trade deal is damaging for UK growth and breaks the Conservative manifesto promise.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association

This is an embarrassment for Liz Truss-the blame lies squarely at her door, as a former Foreign and International Trade Secretary.
